access: You're from Alkenstar or the Mana Wastes.
markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Inured to Alchemy](/Feats.aspx?ID=3573) <actions string="" />
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Outlaws of Alkenstar</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Alchemist" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=7" />
<trait label="Barbarian" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=18" />
<trait label="Fighter" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=71" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #178: Punks in a Powderkeg](/Sources.aspx?ID=119) pg. 79</row>

**Prerequisites**
expert in Fortitude saves

**Access**
You're from Alkenstar or the Mana Wastes.

</column>

---

You've developed control over how your body processes alchemical poisons and drugs. Each of your successful saving throws against an [alchemical poison](/equipment/alchemical-items/alchemical-poisons), a [drug](/equipment/alchemical-items/drugs), or an [addiction](/Diseases.aspx?ID=15) reduces the stage by 2, or by 1 for a [virulent](/Traits.aspx?ID=162) alchemical poison, drug, or addiction. Each critical success reduces the stage by 3, or by 2 for a virulent alchemical poison, drug, or addiction.

<title level="2">Black Powder Feats</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #178: Punks in a Powderkeg](/Sources.aspx?ID=119) pg. 55</row>

If the characters agree to Nixbrix's challenge to defeat Bitey or otherwise impress the gang leader, he offers to teach them a few tricks. The characters gain access to the feats in the Black-Powder Berserkers section on page 79, even if they aren't from Alkenstar or the Mana Wastes, though they still must meet the feats' other prerequisites to take them.

**Related Feats**: [Black Powder Flash](/Feats.aspx?ID=3572), [Pain Tolerance](/Feats.aspx?ID=3574), [Powder Punch Stance](/Feats.aspx?ID=3575), [Thunder Clap](/Feats.aspx?ID=3576)
